sn55.49:1.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho mahanamam sakkam bhagava etadavoca:
sn55.49:1.3: “catuhi kho, mahanama, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti …pe… sambodhiparayano.
sn55.49:2.5: ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.49:2.6: Imehi kho, mahanama, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
